pli-tv-pvr1.6:1.1: When it comes to the offenses for having sexual intercourse, which kind of the four kinds of legal issues are they?
pli-tv-pvr1.6:1.2: They are legal issues arising from an offense. …
pli-tv-pvr1.6:2.1: When it comes to the offense for, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water, which kind of the four kinds of legal issues is it?
pli-tv-pvr1.6:2.2: It is a legal issue arising from an offense.
pli-tv-pvr1.6:3.1: The sixth section on legal issues is finished.
